headline.main: Niger Delta Avengers Say Five Attacks Launched Since Friday in Nigeria's Southern Delta
headline.print_headline: Niger Delta Avengers Say Five Attacks Launched Since Friday in Nigeria's Southern Delta

docs.snippet: The Niger Delta Avengers, a militant group which has carried out a series of attacks on Nigerian oil facilities in the last few months, on Sunday said it had mounted five attacks in the southern energy hub since Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Niger Delta Avengers, a militant group which has carried out a series of attacks on Nigerian oil facilities in the last few months, on Sunday said it had mounted five attacks in the southern energy hub since Friday.

headline.main: Phelps Goes Out on Top in Final US Race, Winning 100 Fly
headline.print_headline: Phelps Goes Out on Top in Final US Race, Winning 100 Fly

docs.snippet: Michael Phelps wasn't about to lose his last race in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps wasn't about to lose his last race in the United States.

headline.main: Salazar Scores 2, Piatti Makes PK as Impact Beat Revolution
headline.print_headline: Salazar Scores 2, Piatti Makes PK as Impact Beat Revolution

docs.snippet: Rookie forward Michael Salazar scored his first two MLS goals and Ignacio Piatti converted a penalty kick to give the Montreal Impact a 3-2 victory over the New England Revolution on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rookie forward Michael Salazar scored his first two MLS goals and Ignacio Piatti converted a penalty kick to give the Montreal Impact a 3-2 victory over the New England Revolution on Saturday.

headline.main: Phelps Makes Final Race on American Soil a Winning One
headline.print_headline: Phelps Makes Final Race on American Soil a Winning One

docs.snippet: Michael Phelps gave the home fans one last thrill when he touched first in the 100 meters butterfly at the U.S. Olympic trials on Saturday in his final race in an American pool....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps gave the home fans one last thrill when he touched first in the 100 meters butterfly at the U.S. Olympic trials on Saturday in his final race in an American pool.

headline.main: Dozens Killed or Injured in Overnight Baghdad Bombings: Sumaria TV
headline.print_headline: Dozens Killed or Injured in Overnight Baghdad Bombings: Sumaria TV

docs.snippet: Several dozen people were killed or injured in two bombings that hit a shopping area and a popular market in Baghdad in the early hours of Sunday as they celebrated Ramadan, local TV channel al-Sumaria said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several dozen people were killed or injured in two bombings that hit a shopping area and a popular market in Baghdad in the early hours of Sunday as they celebrated Ramadan, local TV channel al-Sumaria said.

headline.main: Officials: Grizzly That Has Charged at People Attacks Again
headline.print_headline: Officials: Grizzly That Has Charged at People Attacks Again

docs.snippet: Park officials say a grizzly bear that has previously charged at people has bitten and scratched a hiker, and they will kill the animal when they find it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Park officials say a grizzly bear that has previously charged at people has bitten and scratched a hiker, and they will kill the animal when they find it.

headline.main: Morales, Duffy Lead Royals Over Phillies 6-2
headline.print_headline: Morales, Duffy Lead Royals Over Phillies 6-2

docs.snippet: Danny Duffy pitched deeper than he ever had in a game while Kendrys Morales continued to hit like he has in the last two weeks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Danny Duffy pitched deeper than he ever had in a game while Kendrys Morales continued to hit like he has in the last two weeks.

headline.main: Argentines Take to Streets, Demand Messi Return to National Team
headline.print_headline: Argentines Take to Streets, Demand Messi Return to National Team

docs.snippet: Hundreds of Argentines protested in the pouring rain on Saturday, demanding that soccer star Lionel Messi return to Argentina's national team after he unexpectedly quit following a loss in the regional Copa America final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Argentines protested in the pouring rain on Saturday, demanding that soccer star Lionel Messi return to Argentina's national team after he unexpectedly quit following a loss in the regional Copa America final.

headline.main: Mournful Conte Bids Farewell to Italy After Germany Loss
headline.print_headline: Mournful Conte Bids Farewell to Italy After Germany Loss

docs.snippet: Antonio Conte bowed out as Italy coach on Saturday after a Euro 2016 shootout defeat by Germany sounding almost broken-hearted that he was leaving behind a "fantastic" group of players....
docs.lead_paragraph: Antonio Conte bowed out as Italy coach on Saturday after a Euro 2016 shootout defeat by Germany sounding almost broken-hearted that he was leaving behind a "fantastic" group of players.

headline.main: After 34 Rounds, Then Five Years, Seth Lugo Makes the Most of Two Innings
headline.print_headline: After 34 Rounds, Then Five Years, He Makes the Most of Two Innings

docs.snippet: Once the 1,032nd pick in the draft, Lugo battled injuries and odds to make his major league debut with the Mets....
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitcher Seth Lugo is only player drafted by Mets in 34th round to play major league game; pitched two innings against Chicago Cubs before returning to his Class AAA Las Vegas team.
docs.lead_paragraph: Once the 1,032nd pick in the draft, Lugo battled injuries and odds to make his major league debut with the Mets.
